* It was so...so...strange.
That a single thought like that could have such a blow.
Who needed weapons, when all you had to do was direct your feeling towards 
another.
But she just stood there, still stunned, with her mind trying to recover and 
salvege her own normal thoughts again.
Not moving, not anything.

Iron Raptor hardly even heard Prowls thoughts, her mind still trying to 
think of just what had happened...and why that anger had been so strong.
< Different people have different levels of feelings...and how much of them 
they feel.>
All she could really come to the conclusion was that what Prowl had felt was 
raw, and she wouldn't have been surprised that it had damaged her main 
processor. But something raw like that...she would doubt he would like it 
either.
Maybe that was a lesson...no...it WAS one. They would have to learn to 
controle their thoughts, so that they weren't so loud and powerful.
Prowls anger along had nearly brought her to her knees.
< I'm glad he's not the enemy and on our side.> was her thought as she 
regained her mind and looked up from the ground.
She would also have to learn not to take those feelings the wrong way 
again...this was new...and she didn't know how to react properly.
She even found herself wishing that she could just speak with er mouth 
instead of mer mind. It was much easier.

But Iron Raptor just watched as Prowl stood tall in front of Shadow, looking 
at him and then the enemy. Not moving from where she stood, crossing her 
arms as the cloth on her mack fluttered in the wind.
Looking out from her helm.
She had only tried to help, but if Prowl wanted to go this alone then let 
him.
Shadow had challenged HIM after all.
< I guess...being cooped up in that base made me eager to fight again.>
Still not knowing just how her body could have acted like it had, without 
her mind to guide it...or so it seemed.
But then her eyes turned to Prowl.*

< You can battle if you want.>

* She finally decided, moving back to that her shoulders were facing towards 
the direction of the CF.*

< But I'm going back.>

* And with that she turned her back to the battle, walking off towards their 
destination.*
